segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me your, uh, full name and title? Like, what should I put down?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, it’s, like, I go by Sam, but my full name is Samuel Johnson. No middle names or anything, just that.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Sam. What about your marital status and, um, your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Oh right! I'm, uh, married and my birthday is on 10-04-1985. I was born in, um, New York.
